1.text: And in the seventh month, in one to the month, a holy calling to shall be to you; all work of service ye shall not do: it shall be a day of signal to you.

2.text: And ye did the burnt-offering for an odor of sweetness to Jehovah; one bullock, the son of a cow, one ram, seven blameless lambs, sons of a year.

3.text: And their gift fine flour mingled with oil, three tenths for the bullock, two tenths for the ram,

4.text: And one tenth for the one lamb, for the seven lambs;

5.text: And one he goat of the goats for sin, to expiate for you;

6.text: Besides the burnt-offering of the month and its gift, and the burnt-offering of continuance and its gift, and their libation, according to their judgment, for an odor of sweetness, a sacrifice to Jehovah.

7.text: And in the tenth to this seventh month a holy calling shall be to you: ye afflicted your souls: all work ye shall not do.

8.text: And bring ye near a burnt-offering to Jehovah, an odor of sweetness: one bullock, son of a cow, one ram, seven lambs, sons of a year; blameless they shall be to you.

9.text: And their gift fine flour mingled with oil, three tenths for the bullock, two tenths for the one ram,

10.text: A tenth tenth for the one lamb, the seven lambs:

11.text: One he goat of the goats for sin, besides the sin of expiations, and the burnt-offering of continuance, and its gift and their libations.

12.text: And in the fifteenth day to the seventh month, a holy calling shall be to you: all work of service ye shall not do, and keep ye a festival to Jehovah seven days.

13.text: And ye brought near a burnt-offering, a sacrifice, an odor of sweetness to Jehovah: thirteen bullocks, sons of a cow, two rams, fourteen lambs, sons of a year: blameless shall they be.

14.text: And their gift fine flour mingled with oil, three tenths for the one bullock, for the thirteen bullocks, two tenths for the one ram, for the two rams,

15.text: And a tenth tenth for the one lamb, for the fourteen lambs;

16.text: And one he goat of sin, besides the burnt-offering of continuance, its gift and its libation.

17.text: And in the second day, twelve bullocks, sons of a cow, two rams, fourteen blameless lambs, sons of a year.

18.text: And their gift and their libation for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, according to their judgment:

19.text: And one he goat of the goats for sin: besides the burnt-offering of continuance, and its gift and their libations.

20.text: And in the third day, eleven bullock; two rams, fourteen blameless lambs, sons of a year.

21.text: And their gift and their libations for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, according to judgment:

22.text: And one he goat of the goats for sin; besides the burnt-offering of continuance, and its gift and its libation.

23.text: And in the fourth day, ten bullocks, two rams, fourteen blameless lambs, sons of a year.

24.text: Their gift and their libations for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, according to judgment:

25.text: And one he goat of the goats for sin, besides the burnt-offering of continuance, its gift and its libation.

26.text: And in the fifth day, nine bullocks, two rams, fourteen blameless lambs, sons of a year:

27.text: And their gift and their libations for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, according to judgment:

28.text: And one he goat of sin, besides the burnt-offering of continuance, its gift and its libation.

29.text: And in the sixth day, eight bullocks, two rams, fourteen blameless lambs, sons of a year:

30.text: And their gift and their libations for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, according to judgment:

31.text: And one he goat for sin, besides the burnt-offering of continuance, its gift and its libations.

32.text: And in the seventh day, seven bullocks, two rams, fourteen blameless lambs, sons of a year:

33.text: And their gift and their libations for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, according to their judgment:

34.text: And one he goat of sin, besides the burnt-offering of continuance, its gift and its libation:

35.text: And in the eighth day, a restraint shall be to you: all work of service ye shall not do,

36.text: And bring ye near a burnt-offering, a sacrifice, an odor of sweetness to Jehovah: one bullock, one ram, seven blameless lambs, sons of a year:

37.text: Their gift and their libations for the bullock, for the ram, and for the lambs, according to their number, according to judgment:

38.text: And one he goat of sin, besides the burnt-offering of continuance, and its gift and its libation.

39.text: These ye shall do to Jehovah in your appointments, besides your vows and your voluntary gifts, for your burnt-offerings, and for your gifts, and your libations, and for your peace.

40.text: And Moses will say to the sons of Israel according to all which Jehovah commanded Moses.
